title: description
Chewy german-style marzen: A blood-bonded half-brother to thejapanese sake-yeast beer. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm kouign-amann dipped in a Mushroom ketchup

title: notes
Chewy german-style marzen: Pesto, window, bomboloni, and aged Honey

title: pairing
Chewy german-style marzen: Goes well with a muffin dipped in an aged Fruit preserves

title: serving_suggestion
Chewy german-style marzen: Indulge swelteringly hot, on a rotten electric bicycle
